content.rendered:
Directed by Sajid Ali

Written by Sajid Ali

Cast Avinash Tiwary (Qais Bhat / Majnu). Triptii Dimri (Laila (as Tripti Dimri)). Sumeet Kaul (Ibban / Javed Parray (as Sumit Kaul)). Abrar Qazi (Zaid). Sahiba Bali (Ambreen). Mir Sarwar (Qais’s Brother-in-law). Benjamin Gilani (Ghulam Sarwar Bhat). Parmeet Sethi (Masood Ahmed Shahmiri). Farhana Bhat (Jasmeet). Shagufta Ali (Pufu). Sujata Sehgal (Parveen). Vasundhara Kaul (Qaes’s Sister). Zameer Ashai (Nisar Bukhari). Shahid Gulfam (Rasool). Khawar Jamsheed (Mudi). Moomin Rafiq (Umer). Rj Rafiq (Touseef (as Rafiq)). Duaa Bhat (Shama). Dawar (Young Qaes). Hibba Shafi (Young Laila). Mahid Aisha Ali (Zaid’s Sister). Junaid Rather (STD Boy) . Cricknowle (Sumit). Inam Khan (Cafe manager (uncredited))

Language Hindi

Producers Preety Ali. Rituparna Chowdhury. Khawar Jamsheed. Ekta Kapoor. Shobha Kapoor. Aadil Khan. Sunil Lulla. Nachiket Pantvaidya. Kshitij Prasad. Ruchikaa Kapoor Sheikh. Sanjay Singh

Production Balaji Telefilm. KJ Production. Pi Film
